thread.section_title: Pennsylvania College of Technology Events Calendar
thread.title: Homecoming 2015 (10/8/2015 - 10/11/2015)

title: Homecoming 2015 (10/8/2015 - 10/11/2015)
text:
Event Description Homecoming Save-the-Date A variety of events and activities are planned for you during Homecoming 2015 on October 8-11! Find a few highlights below and save the date. Details and registration coming next month! Diesel & Heavy Construction Reunion Reconnect with faculty, staff, students, and fellow alumni Friday, October 9, at the Earth Science Center. Enjoy lunch, tour the 48,000 sq. ft. lab and heavy construction equipment training site, and see the newly rebuilt 1959 Mack B-61! 2015 Athletic Hall of Fame Banquet Celebrate with former teammates and congratulate alumni inductees Hannah Miles, ’09; Bridget Metzger, ’10; Coleby Frye, ’09; Devon Liquori, ’10; and Lindsey (Fackler) Kornbau, ‘10. 
5 th Annual Alumni Golf Outing Organize your team and hit the golf course Saturday morning. Each player has the chance to win a $100 White Deer Golf Course Pro Shop gift certificate and proceeds benefit the Penn College Endowed Alumni Scholarship. 
WACC Reunion Visit the Advanced Technology and Health Sciences Center and meet students from plastics, dental hygiene, and nursing. You’ll be impressed as they tour you through their program areas! 
Oktoberfest Meet us in the Professional Development Center to sample seasonal foods prepared by Chef Mike’s catering class, paired with a variety of beers. 
Homecoming Carnival Join the family-friendly fun on the Madigan Library lawn. A cappella group Eh440 is featured entertainment at 7 p.m. on Saturday. 
Women’s Soccer vs. Wells College Cheer on the Lady Wildcats at 11 a.m. on Sunday, October 11. 
“A View Within” Stop by The Gallery at Penn College to view a collaboration of two fiber artists – Paula Chung & Karen Rips. Location Information:
